languages.text: "Дружина наша покинула Темный город достойно! Нескоро они позабудут, как гостили в Комморре эттфатер и Ульфар! С удовольствием бы взглянул, как корчатся их малохольные душонки в вызванной нами буре душ!"

"Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"
languages.original_text: "Дружина наша покинула Темный город достойно! Нескоро они позабудут, как гостили в Комморре эттфатер и Ульфар! С удовольствием бы взглянул, как корчатся их малохольные душонки в вызванной нами буре душ!"

traits.locale_text: "Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

"Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

"Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

"Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

languages.text: “我们的战团逃出了黑暗之城！科摩罗一时半会儿恐怕不会忘记狼领与乌尔法是怎么大闹一场的！我真想看看那些软弱的灵魂是如何在我们掀起的灵魂风暴中挣扎的！”
languages.original_text: "Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

traits.locale_text: “我们的战团逃出了黑暗之城！科摩罗一时半会儿恐怕不会忘记狼领与乌尔法是怎么大闹一场的！我真想看看那些软弱的灵魂是如何在我们掀起的灵魂风暴中挣扎的！”

languages.text: « Notre petite troupe a mis un sacré bazar en quittant la Cité Crépusculaire ! Commorragh n'est pas prête d'oublier l'aett-vater et Ulfar, c'est moi qui vous le dit ! Oh, comme j'aimerais voir leurs esprits faibles se tortiller dans la tempête d'âmes que nous avons déclenchée ! »
languages.original_text: "Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

traits.locale_text: « Notre petite troupe a mis un sacré bazar en quittant la Cité Crépusculaire ! Commorragh n'est pas prête d'oublier l'aett-vater et Ulfar, c'est moi qui vous le dit ! Oh, comme j'aimerais voir leurs esprits faibles se tortiller dans la tempête d'âmes que nous avons déclenchée ! »

languages.text: «¡Menuda salida ha tenido nuestra banda de guerreros de la Ciudad Siniestra! Commorragh no olvidará la visita de Ulfar y su Aett-Vater! ¡Me encantaría ver sus endebles espíritus retorcerse ante la tormenta de almas que provocamos!».
languages.original_text: "Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Menuda salida ha tenido nuestra banda de guerreros de la Ciudad Siniestra! Commorragh no olvidará la visita de Ulfar y su Aett-Vater! ¡Me encantaría ver sus endebles espíritus retorcerse ante la tormenta de almas que provocamos!».

languages.text: 「俺たちのウォーバンドは仄暗き都からうまく脱出した！コモラフはアエット＝ヴァテルとウルファーをもてなしたこともすぐに忘れるだろうさ！やつらの弱々しい心が、俺たちが抜けた魂の嵐で身もだえする様を見たいもんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちのウォーバンドは仄暗き都からうまく脱出した！コモラフはアエット＝ヴァテルとウルファーをもてなしたこともすぐに忘れるだろうさ！やつらの弱々しい心が、俺たちが抜けた魂の嵐で身もだえする様を見たいもんだ！」

languages.text: "Prächtig war die Flucht unserer Kriegsbande aus der Dunklen Stadt! Commorragh wird nicht so bald vergessen, wie es einmal den Aett-Vater und Ulfar beherbergt hat! Ich würde zu gerne sehen, wie sich ihr schwacher Geist in dem Sturm der Seelen windet, den wir entfesselt haben!"
languages.original_text: "Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

traits.locale_text: "Prächtig war die Flucht unserer Kriegsbande aus der Dunklen Stadt! Commorragh wird nicht so bald vergessen, wie es einmal den Aett-Vater und Ulfar beherbergt hat! Ich würde zu gerne sehen, wie sich ihr schwacher Geist in dem Sturm der Seelen windet, den wir entfesselt haben!"

languages.original_text: "Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

languages.text: "Savaş güruhumuz, Kara Şehir'den gümbür gümbür ayrıldı! Commorragh, Aett-Vater ve Ulfar'ı misafir ettiğini kolay unutamayacak! Zayıf benliklerinin, biçtiğimiz ruhların fırtınasında acıyla kıvrandığını görmek hoş olurdu!"
languages.original_text: "Our warband made a fine departure from the Dark City! Commorragh will not soon forget when they played host to the Aett-Vater and Ulfar! I would love to see their feeble spirits writhing in the storm of souls we wrought!"

traits.locale_text: "Savaş güruhumuz Kara Şehir'den gümbür gümbür ayrıldı! Commorragh, Aett-Vater ve Ulfar'a ev sahipliği yaptığını kolayca unutamayacak! Zayıf benliklerinin biçtiğimiz ruhların fırtınasında acıyla kıvrandığını görmek hoşuma gidecek!"
